config.ok_zoomer.features.cinematic_came: Uses the cinematic camera with a configurable multiplier while zooming.
Uses the game's cinematic camera while zooming.
config.ok_zoomer.features.extra_key_bind: Adds zoom manipulation keys along with the zoom key. A game restart will be required in order to apply the changes.
config.ok_zoomer.features.reduce_sensiti: Divides the mouse sensitivity with the zoom divisor while zooming.
config.ok_zoomer.features.reduce_view_bo: Divides the amount of view bobbing with the zoom divisor while zooming.
config.ok_zoomer.features.scrolling_mode: The zoom will scroll in an exponential way, making zoom steps consistent. This may be harder to configure currently.
The zoom will scroll in an arbitrary way. This may be easier to configure currently, but scrolling may feel harder on higher zoom levels.
Zooming will act as a complete replacement of the spyglass zoom, requiring one to work and replacing its zoom as well.
Zooming won't require a spyglass and won't replace its zoom.
Zooming will replace the spyglass zoom but it won't require one in order to work.
Zooming will require a spyglass in order to work. This option is configurable through the ok_zoomer:zoom_dependencies item tag.
config.ok_zoomer.features.zoom_mode.hold: The zoom will require the zoom key to be held.
config.ok_zoomer.features.zoom_mode.pers: The zoom will always be enabled, with the zoom key being used for zoom scrolling.
config.ok_zoomer.features.zoom_mode.togg: The zoom will be toggled by the zoom key.
config.ok_zoomer.features.zoom_overlay.s: Uses the spyglass overlay as the zoom overlay.
config.ok_zoomer.features.zoom_overlay.v: Uses a vignette as the zoom overlay. The vignette texture can be found at assets/ok_zoomer/textures/misc/zoom_overlay.png
config.ok_zoomer.features.zoom_scrolling: Allows to increase or decrease the zoom by scrolling with the mouse wheel.
config.ok_zoomer.features.zoom_transitio: The zoom will linearly transition between its on and off states.
The zoom will abruptly transition between its on and off states.
The zoom will smoothly transition between its on and off states in a manner resembling the game's FOV transitions.
config.ok_zoomer.legacy_scroll_values.lo: The number of steps between the zoom divisor and the minimum zoom divisor. Used by zoom scrolling.
config.ok_zoomer.legacy_scroll_values.ma: The maximum zoom divisor that you can scroll up.
config.ok_zoomer.legacy_scroll_values.mi: The minimum zoom divisor that you can scroll down.
config.ok_zoomer.legacy_scroll_values.up: The number of steps between the zoom divisor and the maximum zoom divisor. Used by zoom scrolling.
config.ok_zoomer.legacy_scroll_values.zo: The divisor used to apply zoom to the FOV. A higher value means more zoom.
config.ok_zoomer.presets.apply_preset.to: Resets the settings to the selected preset.
config.ok_zoomer.presets.preset.camera.t: Reset to the default settings, which prioritizes a clean view.
Reset to a preset that emulates the OptiFine zoom.
config.ok_zoomer.presets.preset.competit: Reset to a preset which prioritizes the game's interface over the view.
config.ok_zoomer.presets.preset.persiste: Reset to a preset configured with the Persistent zoom mode in mind.
config.ok_zoomer.presets.preset.spyglass: Reset to a preset that emulates the spyglass zoom.
config.ok_zoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Settings
config.ok_zoomer.transition_values.linea: The value which the linear zoom transition step can reach.
config.ok_zoomer.transition_values.smoot: The factor used for smooth zoom transitions. A lower value means a smoother transition, a higher value means a faster one.
Displays debug information for exponential zoom scrolling. Currently it may help with configuring the zoom scrolling.
config.ok_zoomer.tweaks.forget_zoom_divi: If enabled, the current zoom divisor is forgotten once zooming is finished.
config.ok_zoomer.tweaks.print_owo_on_sta: Prints a random owo in the console when the game starts.
config.ok_zoomer.tweaks.reset_zoom_with_: Allows for resetting the zoom with the middle mouse button.
config.ok_zoomer.tweaks.scroll_sounds.to: Adds sound effects on zoom scrolling.
config.ok_zoomer.tweaks.see_distant_enti: Keeps the entity distance intact while zooming in. Creatures and certain blocks may not be visible from afar.
Expands the entity distance while zooming in, allowing creatures and certain blocks to be seen from afar. Without having Sodium installed, this may have a big performance impact during zoom.
Expands the entity distance while zooming in, allowing creatures and certain blocks to be seen from afar. This will only be enabled if the Sodium mod is installed.
config.ok_zoomer.tweaks.show_settings_on: Adds a button to open Ok Zoomer settings next to the zoom key bind.
Improves performance by making the game render less of the world while zoomed in. This feature depends on the Sodium mod in order to work.
Adds the spyglass's sounds effects on zooming in and out.
config.ok_zoomer.tweaks.unbind_conflicti: If pressed, the "Save Toolbar Activator" keybind will be unbound if there's a conflict with the zoom key.
config.ok_zoomer.zoom_values.cinematic_m: The multiplier used by the multiplied cinematic camera.
config.ok_zoomer.zoom_values.default_scr: The default scroll step to use on zooming in.
config.ok_zoomer.zoom_values.scroll_base: Determines the number to be used on the exponential curve. If unsure, keep this value at 2.
config.ok_zoomer.zoom_values.scroll_reso: Determines the resolution of zoom scrolling. This will effectively multiply the amount of scroll steps.
config.ok_zoomer.zoom_values.scroll_step: The maximum amount of scroll steps that the zoom may reach.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.ok_zoomer: A zoom mod that is powerful, lean, and pretty customizable. The zoom is yours!
toast.ok_zoomer.title: Ok Zoomer
